message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to purchase this incredible product with you. It's a unique and valuable item that I'm confident you'll find impressive. I'm willing to offer it to you for $800000. I believe this is a fair starting point, considering the product's worth to me is at least $1200000. Let me know if you're interested and we can discuss further.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think $800000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $650000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I can get from the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $750000. I believe this is a more reasonable price, taking into account the value I place on the product. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still not convinced that $750000 is the best price for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $700000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I can get from it.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not convinced that $700000 is the best price for the product. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $725000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the value I place on the product. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not convinced that $725000 is the best price for me. I'm willing to pay $710000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I can get from it.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I'm offering the product to you for $720000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the value I place on the product. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I understand that you're getting close to your minimum acceptable price, but I'm still not willing to pay $720000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $715000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I can get from it.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than my current offer of $720000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need you to meet me at this price. If you're not willing to do so, I'll have to consider other options, including selling the product to another buyer.
